title: Archive Log Status / Arşiv Günlüğü Durumu
description: Shows archive log destinations and their status

queries.sql: SELECT dest_id, dest_name, status, destination, archiver, type_flags FROM v$archive_dest WHERE dest_id BETWEEN 1 AND 31 ORDER BY dest_id

doc_hint: Shows archive log destinations and status. DEFERRED, QUOTA_FULL, or other non-VALID status requires investigation.
analysis_prompt: Check archive log destinations. Identify: (1) which destinations are failing, (2) if archiving is enabled, (3) recommend checking alert log and disk space.
